descriptionNullable:
Dataset Name: FaceForensics++ Faces_224
Description:
The FaceForensics++ Faces Dataset is a collection of images extracted from the FaceForensics++ dataset, focusing specifically on facial imagery. It comprises two main categories: "Fake" and "Real," representing manipulated and authentic facial images, respectively.

Dataset Structure:

Image Size: 224x224 pixels
Folders:
FF++_Faces_224/
Contains the extracted and resized images from the FaceForensics++ dataset.
metadata_FF++.csv
A CSV file storing metadata information for each image, including filename (Name) and label (Label) indicating whether the image is "Fake" or "Real."
Intended Use:
The dataset is suitable for tasks such as:

Facial image analysis
Deep learning-based manipulation detection
Image forensics research and development
Note: This dataset is derived from the FaceForensics++ dataset and is intended for research and educational purposes only.
title: FF++_Face_224
subtitle: DeepFake dataset FF++
